text: læa phu dı lea thi ca xthrrm ying pi kwa phu thi xuplokn khwam thec tx xallxh chn hela nan ca thuk na ma senx tx phracea khng phwk khea læa brrda phyan ca klaw wa “phwk hela nan khux brrda phu thi klaw thec tx phracea khxng phwk khea phung ru theid! Kar sap chæng khx ngxallxh ca dikæ brrda phu xthrrm
